roleset.name: turn upside down
roleset.note: INVERT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'invert' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from invert.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Mr. Glass has inverted the famous modernist dictum ``less is more.''
example.arg: the famous modernist dictum ``less is more

example.name: Abstract
example.text: His inversion of classic landscape forms symbolized the strength of traditional Confucian values in a time of social crisis.
